present.spanish: Pienso en mis vacaciones de verano.
present.english: I think about my summer vacation.
present.subject: yo

present.spanish: Piensas mucho antes de tomar decisiones.
present.english: You think a lot before making decisions.
present.subject: tú

present.spanish: Pensás que es una buena idea mudarse.
present.english: You think it's a good idea to move.
present.subject: vos

present.spanish: Piensa que el proyecto va a funcionar.
present.english: He/She thinks the project is going to work.
present.subject: él/ella/usted

present.spanish: Pensamos igual sobre muchas cosas.
present.english: We think alike about many things.
present.subject: nosotros

present.spanish: Pensáis en el futuro con optimismo.
present.english: You all think about the future with optimism.
present.subject: vosotros

present.spanish: Piensan en sus familias constantemente.
present.english: They think about their families constantly.
present.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

present.spanish: Entiendo español perfectamente ahora.
present.english: I understand Spanish perfectly now.
present.subject: yo

present.spanish: Entiendes las matemáticas mejor que yo.
present.english: You understand mathematics better than me.
present.subject: tú

present.spanish: Entendés perfectamente lo que te digo.
present.english: You understand perfectly what I'm telling you.
present.subject: vos

present.spanish: Entiende la situación mejor que nadie.
present.english: He/She understands the situation better than anyone.
present.subject: él/ella/usted

present.spanish: Entendemos el problema claramente.
present.english: We understand the problem clearly.
present.subject: nosotros

present.spanish: Entendéis las instrucciones sin dificultad.
present.english: You all understand the instructions without difficulty.
present.subject: vosotros

present.spanish: Entienden el arte moderno muy bien.
present.english: They understand modern art very well.
present.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

present.spanish: Siento mucho frío en invierno.
present.english: I feel very cold in winter.
present.subject: yo

present.spanish: Sientes la música en el alma.
present.english: You feel the music in your soul.
present.subject: tú

present.spanish: Sentís una gran pasión por el arte.
present.english: You feel a great passion for art.
present.subject: vos

present.spanish: Siente dolor en la espalda frecuentemente.
present.english: He/She feels back pain frequently.
present.subject: él/ella/usted

present.spanish: Sentimos mucha alegría por tu éxito.
present.english: We feel great joy for your success.
present.subject: nosotros

present.spanish: Sentís nostalgia por vuestra juventud.
present.english: You all feel nostalgia for your youth.
present.subject: vosotros

present.spanish: Sienten orgullo por sus logros.
present.english: They feel pride in their achievements.
present.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

present.spanish: Vengo de la universidad en autobús.
present.english: I come from the university by bus.
present.subject: yo

present.spanish: Vienes conmigo al concierto mañana.
present.english: You come with me to the concert tomorrow.
present.subject: tú

present.spanish: Venís a casa para el almuerzo.
present.english: You come home for lunch.
present.subject: vos

present.spanish: Viene a visitarnos cada domingo.
present.english: He/She comes to visit us every Sunday.
present.subject: él/ella/usted

present.spanish: Venimos en tren desde Madrid.
present.english: We come by train from Madrid.
present.subject: nosotros

present.spanish: Venís de muy lejos para vernos.
present.english: You all come from very far to see us.
present.subject: vosotros

present.spanish: Vienen de diferentes países de Europa.
present.english: They come from different European countries.
present.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

present.spanish: Pongo la mesa para la cena.
present.english: I set the table for dinner.
present.subject: yo

present.spanish: Pones música clásica para relajarte.
present.english: You put on classical music to relax.
present.subject: tú

present.spanish: Ponés mucha atención en los detalles.
present.english: You pay a lot of attention to details.
present.subject: vos

present.spanish: Pone las llaves siempre en el mismo lugar.
present.english: He/She always puts the keys in the same place.
present.subject: él/ella/usted

present.spanish: Ponemos flores frescas en el jardín.
present.english: We put fresh flowers in the garden.
present.subject: nosotros

present.spanish: Ponéis mucho esfuerzo en vuestro trabajo.
present.english: You all put a lot of effort into your work.
present.subject: vosotros

present.spanish: Ponen atención especial a los clientes.
present.english: They pay special attention to customers.
present.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

present.spanish: Salgo de casa a las ocho.
present.english: I leave home at eight.
present.subject: yo

present.spanish: Sales con tus amigos cada viernes.
present.english: You go out with your friends every Friday.
present.subject: tú

present.spanish: Salís a bailar los sábados por la noche.
present.english: You go out dancing on Saturday nights.
present.subject: vos

present.spanish: Sale del trabajo muy tarde cada día.
present.english: He/She leaves work very late every day.
present.subject: él/ella/usted

present.spanish: Salimos de viaje el próximo mes.
present.english: We leave on a trip next month.
present.subject: nosotros

present.spanish: Salís de excursión cada fin de semana.
present.english: You all go on excursions every weekend.
present.subject: vosotros

present.spanish: Salen de compras juntas los martes.
present.english: They go shopping together on Tuesdays.
present.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

present.spanish: Me ducho por la mañana antes de trabajar.
present.english: I shower in the morning before work.
present.subject: yo

present.spanish: Te duchas con agua muy caliente.
present.english: You shower with very hot water.
present.subject: tú

present.spanish: Te duchás después de hacer ejercicio.
present.english: You shower after exercising.
present.subject: vos

present.spanish: Se ducha dos veces al día en verano.
present.english: He/She showers twice a day in summer.
present.subject: él/ella/usted

present.spanish: Nos duchamos rápidamente por la mañana.
present.english: We shower quickly in the morning.
present.subject: nosotros

present.spanish: Os ducháis antes de salir de fiesta.
present.english: You all shower before going out to party.

present.spanish: Se duchan después de trabajar en el jardín.
present.english: They shower after working in the garden.
